title:
Theory of general theta relations, addition formulas, and theta
  constants identities
abstract:
Jacobi's theta relations among quartic products of theta functions are
generalized to those of arbitrary $n$ products. Igusa's procedure of derivation
is extended to prove such general theta relations, from which we obtain general
addition formulas and theta constants identities. To complete the proof, the
concept of {\it cycle number $\lambda$} is essential. The case of $n=3$ is
discussed and examined explicitly.
